DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the clinical efficacy and cost-effectiveness of the ACQUIRE-ICD care innovation as add-on to usual care as compared to usual care alone in patients with an implantable cardioverter defibrillator.
DOC.brief_title: A Personalized and Interactive Web-based Health Care Innovation to Advance the Quality of Care
